duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess, quantify, test, and implement controls to ensure compliance with internal business process rules and external regulations.
Review and investigate actions that trigger flags in various review systems.
Conduct research and data gathering from financial advisors.
Conduct annual financial advisor compliance interviews/audits, including inspection of business practices and physical location.
Assist in training, education, and tracking of financial advisors.
Provide support to branch controls manager Regional Director.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
FINRA Series 24 within 60 Days of Hire
